DOC.brief_summary: To compare the antidepressant efficacy and safety of subjects receiving DVS-233 SR versus subjects receiving placebo.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating DVS-233 SR In Adult Outpatients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Outpatients Sexually active women participating in the study must use a medically acceptable form of contraception Subjects must have a primary diagnosis of major depressive disorder Treatment with DVS233 SR at any time in the past Treatment with venlafaxine (immediate release [IR] or extended release [ER]) within 90 days of study day 1 Known hypersensitivity to venlafaxine (IR or ER)
